backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with user, business, subscription, reward, and access-control data models and storage maps, plus role/block checks and authorization/storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to related source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files related to UI states, admin tools, customer pages, and seller dashboards.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, dark mode values, and base component styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point for the PWA with manifest links, icons, splash images, and script bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and display behavior.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page prompting users to reconnect or retry.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing app-shell caching, offline fallback routing, and cache cleanup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining routes for admin, seller, and customer areas with auth, role, and approval guards.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access‑denied message with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow with loading states and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal that collects a user's name and saves their profile via mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAppr: Wrapper that redirects unapproved non-admin users and shows a loading spinner during approval checks.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Guards routes by checking authentication status and redirecting unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role-based access guard that checks user roles and renders an access denied screen if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/business/Busines: Displays a business's name, address, and unlock badge with optional verified indicator.
frontend/src/components/business/Verifie: Shows a styled badge with a check icon indicating verified status.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer displaying disclaimer text and a credit link with dynamic year and host.
Layout wrapper providing full-height structure with main content and footer.
frontend/src/config/unlock.ts: Defines unlock duration and pricing config and provides a helper to compute duration in nanoseconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor instance, invalidating queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Aggregates identity, profile, role, admin, and approval state into a unified auth hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, admin checks, approvals, and business profile operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/StateScreens.tsx: Reusable loading, error, empty, and success screen components with icons and optional actions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin layout with navigation tabs and outlet for nested admin pages.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/CityCategoryMan: UI stubs for managing cities and categories, pending backend CRUD support.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/KycDashboard.ts: Displays pending KYC submissions and allows admins to approve or reject them.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/Reports.tsx: Stub page for viewing customer reports, awaiting backend implementation.
Shows token, subscription, and total revenue using fetched statistics.
Basic UI for viewing and managing user role assignments.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/UserApprovals.t: Lists seller approval requests and lets admins approve or reject them.
Allows blocking/unblocking users and blocking by manual principal input.
frontend/src/pages/AuthGate.tsx: Routes authenticated users based on role and handles profile setup and PWA install prompt.
frontend/src/pages/Customer/BusinessDeta: Displays business info and allows customers to unlock full details by purchasing access, then navigates to a confirmation screen.
frontend/src/pages/Customer/CustomerLayo: Provides the main customer layout with header, login, and tab navigation for search, history, rewards, and QR scan pages.
frontend/src/pages/Customer/QRScan.tsx: Placeholder screen for QR code scanning, describing upcoming scanner integration.
frontend/src/pages/Customer/ReportHelp.t: Form for customers to submit issue reports about a business, currently storing data locally and navigating back.
frontend/src/pages/Customer/RewardsWalle: Shows total reward points, QR scan actions, and a history of earned rewards fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/Customer/Search.tsx: Search page that lists businesses with filtering by name and navigation to business details.
frontend/src/pages/Customer/UnlockConfir: Confirmation page displayed after unlocking a business, including a disclaimer and return button.
frontend/src/pages/Customer/UnlockHistor: Displays the user's history of business unlocks with timestamps and active/expired status.
frontend/src/pages/OfflineFallback.tsx: Offline fallback screen prompting users to reconnect and retry loading the app.
frontend/src/pages/Seller/Analytics.tsx: Seller analytics dashboard showing unlock counts, revenue, and filterable time ranges.
frontend/src/pages/Seller/ApprovalStatus: Displays seller approval status and provides a button to request approval if pending.
frontend/src/pages/Seller/BusinessProfil: Form page for creating or editing the seller’s business profile using query hooks and validation.
frontend/src/pages/Seller/KycPortal.tsx: Displays the seller’s KYC status with icons and badges, with future document upload planned.
Fetches and lists seller leads, showing timestamps and expiry status with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/Seller/QrCode.tsx: Generates and displays a QR code linking to the seller’s business page using an external QR API.
frontend/src/pages/Seller/SellerLayout.t: Layout wrapper for seller pages providing tab navigation and header with login.
frontend/src/pages/Seller/Subscription.t: Shows subscription status, expiry date, and allows renewing via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker in production after window load.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, containers, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata for the BHARATcnt PWA, including versioning, architectural notes, required images, and a list of existing features for Admin, Seller, and User modules. Contains no code but outlines planned functionality such as authentication, KYC, dashboards, subscriptions, and unlock flows.
